729891f-a.title: Richmond: Water Street - Bay Street
729891f-a.text:
Water Street (left), south side, east from Bay Street. The buildings on the right are on Bay Street, extending south to
Canal Street.
January 13, 1931
P. L. Sperr
729891f-a.folder: Water Street & Bay Street, Staten Island, NY

729892f-a.title: Richmond: Water Street - Bay Street
729892f-a.text:
Water Street, north side, between Bay and Front Streets, showing the flagman's sentry box and the Stapleton
station of the 3taten Island Railroad.
Mey, 1, 1231
P. L. Sperr
729892f-a.folder: Water Street & Bay Street, Staten Island, NY
